promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic rare serpent grass-type wearing golden gemstones. It can be found in forest-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or grass. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gildedserp, a gigantic rare serpent grass-type pokemon. It can be found in forest-like environments It has the following abilities: grass-whistle. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word serpent or grass or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, serpent-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, emerald bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Gildedserp slithers thru forests, its whistle a siren song. It survives on grass, and awaits its next challenge.
